com.github.kpgtb.ktools.manager.language

Class LanguageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kpgtb.ktools.manager.language.LanguageManager

  • public class LanguageManager
extends Object
    LanguageManager handles all message translations

    • Constructor Detail

      • LanguageManager

        public LanguageManager(File dataFolder,
                       String lang,
                       DebugManager debug)
        Constructor of Global LanguageManager. Use only in Ktools!
        Parameters:
        dataFolder - Folder with plugin's data. Use JavaPlugin#getDataFolder() to get this
        lang - Language of messages. Get this from plugin's config
        debug - Instance of DebugManager

      • LanguageManager

        public LanguageManager(File dataFolder,
                       String lang,
                       DebugManager debug,
                       LanguageManager globalManager)
        Constructor of Plugin's LanguageManager. Use in other plugins!
        Parameters:
        dataFolder - Folder with plugin's data. Use JavaPlugin#getDataFolder() to get this
        lang - Language of messages. Get this from plugin's config
        debug - Instance of DebugManager
        globalManager - Instance of Global LanguageManager. Take it from Ktools

    • Method Detail

      • saveDefaultLanguage

        public void saveDefaultLanguage(String path,
                                org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin)
        Save default language file
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file in resources folder (lang/{lang_code}.yml)
        plugin - Instance of plugin

      • refreshMessages

        public void refreshMessages()

      • getComponent

        public ArrayList<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> getComponent(LanguageLevel languageLevel,
                                                                  String code,
                                                                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                                  ArrayList<net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver> placeholders)
        Get message translation as list of Component
        Parameters:
        languageLevel - LanguageLevel PLUGIN (from lang) or GLOBAL (from Ktools)
        code - Code of message
        player - Player to PlaceholderAPI
        placeholders - List of Placeholder
        Returns:
        A list of translated components with PAPI and plugin's placeholders
